Package suncertify.db

Provides the DBAccess interface and its local data file implementation as well as all exception classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DBAccess Interface that needs to be implemented by classes providing access to the database.
 

Class Summary
Data Implementation of the DBAccess interface that operates directly on a data file.
FileAccess Component used to manage the low-level accesses to the data file.
 

Exception Summary
CorruptDatabaseException Instances of this exception class are thrown, if the database or data file is unaccessible or does not conform to the specified database schema.
DuplicateKeyException Exception thrown by the createRecord method of the DBAccess interface.
NetworkErrorException Exception instances are thrown when a client cannot invoke an operation on a server object because of I/O problems.
RecordAlreadyBookedException Exception class thrown if a record cannot be booked because it has already been booked.
RecordNotFoundException Exception class thrown by DBAccess method if a record with the specified number does not exist or if it is marked as deleted
SecurityException Exception class thrown by DBAccess methods if an access is attempted on a record that is locked with a cookie other than the given cookie value.
TechnicalErrorException Instances of this exception class are thrown if a technical error occurs, e.g. if a database or data file is not accessible or if the network is unavailable etc.
 

Package suncertify.db Description

Provides the DBAccess interface and its local data file implementation as well as all exception classes.
